plot: A Child Protective Services employee becomes discontented with the disregard toward 'abused children' and finally decides to take matters into his own hands.
title: The Vigilante
plot_es: A Child Protective Services employee becomes discontented with the disregard toward 'abused children' and finally decides to take matters into his own hands.
plot_en: A Child Protective Services employee becomes discontented with the disregard toward 'abused children' and finally decides to take matters into his own hands.
